sentences.en: Adults are often immune to German measles.
sentences.cn: 成人往往对风疹有免疫力。

sentences.en: AIDS stands for Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome.
sentences.cn: AIDS是获得性免疫缺损综合征的缩写。

sentences.en: Being the only son in the family, the young man was immune from military service.
sentences.cn: 由于是独子, 那个年轻人被免于服兵役.

sentences.en: Eye problems can indicate an unhealthy lifestyle with subsequent suppression of the immune system.
sentences.cn: 患眼疾可能表明生活方式不健康，而且免疫系统同时受到抑制。

sentences.en: I am immune from the disease, for I had it once.
sentences.cn: 我对这病有免疫力, 因为我已得过一次了.

sentences.en: No one is immune from scandal.
Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.cn: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

sentences.en: Problems arise when the body's immune system is not functioning adequately.
sentences.cn: 免疫系统不能充分发挥作用时,身体就会出现问题.

sentences.en: Stress can wreak havoc on the immune system.
sentences.cn: 压力可能会破坏免疫系统。

sentences.en: The average man or woman in the street doesn't know very much about immune disorders.
sentences.cn: 普通人一般不是很了解何谓免疫机能紊乱。

sentences.en: The immune system is our main defence against disease.
sentences.cn: 人体的免疫系统是抵御疾病的主要屏障。

sentences.en: The Labour Party is not immune to new ideas.
sentences.cn: 工党也受到新思潮的影响。

sentences.en: The senior members of the group appeared to be immune from arrest.
sentences.cn: 该团体的资深成员似乎可免遭逮捕。

sentences.en: The syndrome is more likely to strike those whose immune systems are already below par.
sentences.cn: 这种综合征更容易对那些免疫系统已经低于正常水平的人构成威胁。

sentences.en: The two sides solemnly declared, " The region must be made immune from any foreign interference.
sentences.cn: ”双方庄严宣告: “必须使这一地区免受外国干涉. ”

sentences.en: What man was ever immune from death ? Let me but leave a loyal heart shining in the pages of history.
sentences.cn: 人生自古谁无死,留取丹心照汗青.

sentences.en: Yoga can be used to strengthen the immune system.
sentences.cn: 瑜伽能增强人体免疫系统。

words.tran_cn: 使免疫（immunize的过去式、过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 艾滋病；获得性免疫缺陷综合症
注射疫苗后在身体内所产生的抗体
免疫反应（体内免疫系统对外来有机体或化学物挑战所作出的反应）；免疫应答；免疫响应

trans.tran_cn: 免疫的，有免疫力的，不受影响的，免除…的
trans.tran_en: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it
